mapper.select: select u.user_id user_id ,login_id ,password ,role_name ,user_name ,d.dept_code dept_code ,dept_name from user_role ur join sjc_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id join sjc_role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id join department d on d.dept_code = u.dept_code where login_id = #{username}

select u.user_id user_id ,login_id ,password ,role_name ,user_name ,d.dept_code dept_code ,dept_name from user_role ur join sjc_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id join sjc_role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id join department d on d.dept_code = u.dept_code
AND u.user_id = #{userId}
AND UPPER(u.login_id) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{loginId} || '%')
AND UPPER(u.user_name) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{userName} || '%')
AND UPPER(r.role_name) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{roleName} || '%')
AND UPPER(d.dept_code) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{deptCode} || '%')
AND UPPER(d.dept_name) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{deptName} || '%')
ORDER BY u.user_id
